org.drip.function.definition

Class R1ToR1

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.function.definition.R1ToR1
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlmgrenEnhancedEulerUpdate, AndersenPiterbargMeanReverter, Bennett, CalibratableMultiSegmentSequence, EmpiricalLearnerLoss, ExponentialDecay, ExponentialTension, FlatUnivariate, FunctionClassSupremum, GrossProfitExpectation, HyperbolicTension, KLKHyperbolicTensionPhy, KLKHyperbolicTensionPsy, LinearRationalShapeControl, MonotoneConvexHaganWest, NaturalLogSeriesElement, OffsetIdempotent, Polynomial, QuadraticRationalShapeControl, SABRLIBORCapVolatility, SegmentBasisFunction, TensionBasisHat, TransactionFunction, UnivariateConvolution, UnivariateReciprocal, UnivariateReflection

    public abstract class R1ToR1
extends java.lang.Object
    R1ToR1 provides the evaluation of the objective function and its derivatives for a specified variate. Default implementation of the derivatives are for non-analytical black box objective functions.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
